member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_STATUS
member.summary: Defines the possible states of Direct Manipulation. The viewport can process input in any state unless otherwise noted.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_STATUS.DIRECTMANIPULATION_BUILDING
member.summary: The viewport is being initialized and is not yet able to process input.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_STATUS.DIRECTMANIPULATION_DISABLED
member.summary: The viewport is disabled and cannot process input or callbacks. The viewport can be enabled by calling Enable.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_STATUS.DIRECTMANIPULATION_RUNNING
member.summary: The viewport is currently processing input and updating content.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_STATUS.DIRECTMANIPULATION_INERTIA
member.summary: The viewport is moving content due to inertia.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_STATUS.DIRECTMANIPULATION_READY
member.summary: The viewport has completed the previous interaction.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_STATUS.DIRECTMANIPULATION_SUSPENDED
member.summary: The transient state of the viewport when input has been promoted to an ancestor in the SetContact chain.
